name: Succubus Girlfriend
description: This is a casual puzzle decryption game with "memory card elimination + exquisite sexy CG" with a rich plot. Through the card decryption method in short-term memory, players can exercise their memory while also experiencing wonderful visual enjoyment. The immersive sense of plot substitution will also bring a different sensory experience. Levels of different difficulty will increasingly test the player’s instantaneous memory, and the rewards for passing levels will become more and more generous. More content can only be understood, not in words.
